EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Follow UP (1327681326.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Brian,
Good to hear from you. The insure we offer is a high deductible plan form Aetna. The plan details can be found on personal page here.
Pelase let me know if you have any additional questions!
Thanks, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Brian Duffy [mailto:duffy.brian@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, January 26, 2012 1:27 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Follow UP
Hi Sara,
I'm still considering my options, and one of my clients is out of town until next week, so I don't have a final answer yet. However, I am still very interested. One question I didn't elaborate on during our phone call was the issue of insurance. How is this handled by MBO partners? If I sign up, what are my options for Health and Dental coverage?
Thanks a bunch, Brian On Thu, Jan 26, 2012 at 12:14 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Brian,
Hope you are doing well. I just wanted to follow up on our call form this past Monday. Please let me know if you have any additional questions or if you need anything from me.
Take care, Sara
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, January 23, 2012 1:43 PM To: duffy.brian@gmail.com Subject: MBO Partners
Dear Brian ,
It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here.
We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here.
I will follow up with you on Wednesday as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule.
Best regards, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
